title: Adobe Target Classification Fields
description: A set of meta-data fields that will classify Target activities and experiences.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/c.title: Activity Name
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/c.description: The name of the Target activity.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/c.title: Experience Name
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/c.description: The name of the Target experience.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/c.title: Activity Experience
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/c.description: Target Activity name concatenated with experience name.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/c.title: Third Id
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/c.description: The third id of the classification record.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/c.title: Analytics Reporting
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/c.description: The reporting type associated with the Target activity.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/c.title: Active Dates
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/c.description: The date of Target activity activation.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/c.title: Control Experience
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/c.description: The experience set as control experience in the Target activity.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/c.title: Algorithm Id
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/c.description: The identity of the algorithm used in the Target activity.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/c.title: Control vs Targeted
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/c.description: The traffic allocation type for the Target activity.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/c.title: Traffic Type Id
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/target/c.description: The identity of the traffic type associated with Target activity.
